Title: Requires health insurers to accept payments for coverage of health care from third parties
Summary: Requires health insurers to accept payments for coverage of health care from third parties.
LawCode: Amd §4406-c, Pub Health L; amd §§3217-b & 4325, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the insurance law, in relation to requiring health insurers to accept third party payments for coverage
